text: "Word to the Badd!!" is a song by American musician Jermaine Jackson on the album You Said. The song reached #78 on the Billboard Hot 100 on November 30, 1991. The song features vocals from Tionne Watkins. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1991–92) !Peak position |- |U.S. Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|78 |- |U.S. Billboard Hot Black Singles |align="center"|88 |- |U.S. Billboard Radio Songs |align="center"|56 |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Genius: Word to the Badd!! - Lyrics Category:1991 singles Category:1991 songs Category:Jermaine Jackson songs Category:Songs written by Daryl Simmons Category:Songs written by Jermaine Jackson Category:Songs written by L.A.
